params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.enabled
params.description: Whether the serving infrastructure will authenticate and authorize all incoming requests. If true, the oauth2_client_id and oauth2_client_secret fields must be non-empty.

params.name: data.oauth2_client_id
params.description: OAuth2 client ID to use for the authentication flow.

params.name: data.oauth2_client_secret
params.description: OAuth2 client secret to use for the authentication flow. For security reasons, this value cannot be retrieved via the API. Instead, the SHA-256 hash of the value is returned in the oauth2_client_secret_sha256 field. @InputOnly

params.name: data.oauth2_client_secret_sha256
params.description: Hex-encoded SHA-256 hash of the client secret. @OutputOnly
